content: together ensuring the seam remains on the inside of the headband caroline headband | ellikin knits ©2025 | 4 super bulky version 2 cast on using 9mm us size 13 knitting needles cast on 15 sts row 1 k3 p9 k3 row 2 k15 row 3 k3 p9 k3 row 4 k3 c6f k6 row 5 k3 p9 k3 row 6 k15 row 7 k3 p9 k3 row 8 k6 c6b k3 repeat row 1-8 until your piece measures 16-18 long for me that was 7 more times totaling 8 repeats ending on row 8 cast off cast off using your preferred method leaving a 12-inch tail for sewing i used the traditional bind-off then sew the ends together ensuring the seam remains on the inside of the headband caroline headband| ellikin knits ©2025 | 5
